items.summary: Improve text readability in the hero section by strengthening the overlay/contrast behind all headline and body text elements. Increase the darkness/opacity of the background overlay so that the hero image does not bleed through and reduce text legibility. Ensure the heading, subheading, and paragraph text all meet strong contrast ratios against the hero background image.

Remove the jumping/animated scrolling text element from the hero section. Any animated text that bounces, jumps, or loops as a scroll indicator or decorative element should be removed or replaced with a static, non-animated alternative if a scroll cue is still desired.
